name: ✝ "Do Not Despair vII", bracelet

name: ✝ "Night River", necklace
description:
“TWENTY bridges from Tower to Kew -
Wanted to know what the River knew, 
Twenty Bridges or twenty-two,
For they were young, and the Thames was old
And this is the tale that River told:”  Rudyard Kipling

✝The Composition: 
Like the Thames at night. Dark river gleaming with a film of mucky opalescence hauling its secrets through time. Beautiful (unmucky) dark peacock blue/black potato freshwater pearls flow into a pair of irregular faceted blue agate slabs. Finished with a gold plated hook clasp and chain. 

✝The Size: 
I wanted to make a necklace that can be worn at different angles to give a variety of looks. The necklace is about 19.5 inches long. Please let me know if you would like me to make it longer.

**** This is a one of a kind necklace. It will never again be recreated****

name: ✝ "The Japan Stationery Shop", tinned candle
description:
The Story: 
A traditional stationers on a street corner anywhere in Japan. A confuddling olfactory experience that muddles bamboo brushes, woodcased pencils, ink, plastic erasers, floors regularly scrubbed with detergent, pencil shavings and stacks upon stacks of paper and old accounts.

✝The Composition: 
Crisp top notes of bergamot, lemon muddled in the middle with perplexing eucalyptus and lavender.  Japanese cedar meets red cedar, massoia wood and frankincense at the base of this fragrance.


A thought provoking, unique and strange scent.

This is a generously scented candle created with a thoughtful blend of fragrance and essential oils. Each one is hand poured and made with a superior quality soy wax and a cotton wick.

✝The Mortality: 
This is a tinned candle containing about 150g of wax. Measures 7.2cm x 4.5cm and has an approx burn time of 20 hours.

✝ A Note About Soy Wax: 
Soy wax is a clean burning wax as it contains 90% less soot than paraffin wax so it is ceiling and wall friendly. Soy wax is easy to clean up with just soap and water. When you come to the end of your candle, remove the wick, give the tin a quick wash and send it back to me for refilling :)

✝ 1st Light: 
When you 1st light your candle, allow the soy wax to create an even melt pool that reaches all sides of the containers.

UK DELIVERY ONLY (mean customs laws)

>>>SAVE YOUR TINS! Return 5 to me and I will give you a free candle of your choice<<<

A detailed and wonderfully textured little acorn adorns a diamond cut princess length chain. These necklaces have a really pretty almost ethereal shimmer to them. Perfect for the season!  Choose either a rose gold or gold plated chain.

✝The Size: 
The chain is often referred to as a "princess length" and it sits on the collar bone. Measures about 15 inches but has an extender that will bring it up to 16.5 inches.

name: ✝ "Always Time for Adventure", foldable bag
description:
✝The Story: 
 
There is a peculiar woman that lurks in corners of Stranger London. She is industrious and determined in all she does. Thoroughly eccentric, she is often heard muttering to herself or seen exploding into a wild jig to suit her fancy. “Things that bring us moments of joy and comfort must not be carted about the place in ugly plastic bags!” Exclaims the olde mistress of Stranger London.

✝The Composition: 
Hand made double-sided patchwork foldable eco bags. Each of them made by me using a fine cotton linen cloth. The handles are made of cotton webbing that is soft on the hand yet durable and robust and the bag is lined with a polycotton gingham. The bag is soft and foldable for easy stowing till needed. Perfect for the carting about of books, magazines, magic wands and even your grocery shopping, do without those plastic bags and use something unique and made with heart!

✝The Size: 
The bag (excluding the handles) measures about 30cm by 28.5cm. The handles are about 28cm from the join with the bag to the top of their arch and so quite able to be worn as a shoulder bag

Washable. Machine wash as delicate, air dry flat and iron on medium.

Just one left so the item sent will be the exact one in the photos.

name: ✝ "The Behaviour of Two", necklace
description:
Two. Always together yet free. In adventure, through it all.

✝The Composition: 
Lustrous pearls. One white with a lustre of pink and silver, the other, black with a peacock lustre of blue and green depending on the light. Each pearl is mounted on a gold plate triple petal setting and then strung on a gold plated diamond cute chain.

✝The Size: 
The chain is often referred to as a "princess length" and it sits on the collar bone. Measures about 15 inches but has an extender that will bring it up to 16.5 inches.

✝ A Note About Shell Based Pearls:
Shell based pearls have a beautiful lustre and weight and are created from mother of pearl. They include the raw material of the shell within the base of the "pearl" to add weight and durability.

name: ✝ "A Fallen Rose Atmosphere", necklace
description:
Flowers bought for broken promises, forgotten occasions and hidden lies.

“The very essence of romance is uncertainty.” Oscar Wilde

✝The Composition:

✝The Size: 
The bubble measures about 25mm. 
The chain is purposely long, measuring about 24 inches. This can be shortened upon request. Sterling silver chain can also be arranged.

✝The Size:

name: ✝ "Liberty Wilderness²", boxy cosmetics purse
description:
✝The Composition: 
This boxy little cosmetics purse is made using a wonderful limited edition Liberty London Tana Lawn Fabric called "Manning", now sold out. 

The pouch has been reinforced and is stiff enough to hold its shape.

✝The Details: 
The lining is a monotone gingham cotton cloth and has been hand stitched into place. The pouch also features a cotton handle to make zipping and carrying easy. The zip has been top-stitched into place to make it stronger and nicer to look at. This also prevents the zip getting caught on the lining.

✝The Size: 
Measures approx: 11.5cm x 11.5cm and is about 6.5cm deep

✝ A Note About Liberty Tana Lawn: 
Liberty Tana Lawn was launched in 1920 and originally used cotton from the shores of Lake Tana in Sudan. Liberty cotton in exceptionally fine, light and strong with a smooth sheen that makes it feel comparable to silk. There is no doubt why this is the most famous fine cotton in the world.

This cloth is called "Manning" and takes its inspiration from William Morris’ poem; ‘Iceland First Seen’, the Liberty design team travelled to Iceland on an exploration of the senses to create a series of designs relating to the wonders of sight. 

Manning is a digital design created using photographs of Icelandic glaciers and mountains.

Like watching Luna Lovegood dance in the summer sun, wearing wild flowers in her hair.

✝The Composition:

name: ✝ "Go Away Rain Cloud Joy + Sorrow", hair accessory
description:
Go Away Rainy Cloud!

A garden favoured by gorgeously colourful butterflies that flutter and loiter in the hair of passing ladies. These darling bows are meant to be positioned upon your your ponytails, braids or buns. While they are not guaranteed to bring out the sun, they will encourage happy thoughts and sunny smiles!

Each bow is made by me using hand-picked fabrics chosen for their high quality finish and beautiful prints and combined with the best quality durable hairbands that I could find.

As every bow is made by hand, each one will be unique. I have tried to make them in a way that they will last and last.

So, even after the hair elastic component goes, the bow can be fixed onto a new one and continue to be used.

Mo Coppoletta has an international reputation for unique and exquisite tattoos, so was the perfect choice to represent this collection inspired by the art of touch. 

Joy and Sorrow is derived from a fascination Mo has with nursery rhymes and their dark magic. He wanted to symbolise the Liberty peacock by using different kinds of birds. Mo adorned them with strings of pearls, deco brooches and surrounded them with dragonflies, all of which were inspired by Liberty archive prints from the 1920s, creating a surrealist design with deep dark grounds. 


☆*･゜ﾟ･ The lovely GlacialGlow showing off her Go Away Rain Cloud bow! Check out her blog too: http://glacial-glow.blogspot.com/ *･゜ﾟ･*☆

name: ✝ "Stranger London's Deux Macaron Gold Heart", bag charm
description:
True eye candy that looks delectable enough to bite into. The Stranger London patisserie has created a collection of darling looking confections that celebrate the sublime, magical and elegant patisserie of the eternal tea salons of Paris.

Painstakingly created by hand using a special blend of polymer clay and a lot of patience, two little macarons stacked together, filled and decorated with an accompanying sugar bowl and a heart shaped Swarovski sculpture made by stringing together 72 golden individual little crystals. The sage green satin bow has been specially treated so that it will not unravel.

Please don't try and eat this. It will make your tummy hurt! Each one is unique and individual as I am quite incapable of making replicas.

name: ✝ "Hide + Seek Hello Kitty" travel card case
description:
The "1,2 or 3 Envelope Cases", thus called because you can only fit one, two or three credit card sized fings within them, are handmade by me (as per) using the loveliest and most highest quality materials. Strong yet pretty cottons all the way from Japan and some from right here in London. Ribbons and lace from Sweden and Finland and fasteners from our French neighbours. Each one of these cases has been made with all the care and attention possible, in the hope that you will love them and in return they will last you a good while.

>>This version is made using a now unobtainable Hello Kitty and LIberty London fabric taken from their only collaboration in UK. The inside is lined with a pink modern version of a traditional Japanese print. Both are 100% cotton. The outer layer has been strengthened with a firm interfacing to give it extra support and the case closes with a rust-proof popper. Make it all the more special and unique...personalise it with a lace monogram that will be carefully and lovingly hand stitched into place.


Size: 
Good to fit your Oyster Card, Pasmo, Suica or other credit card-sized travel cards.


***DONT FORGET TO LET ME KNOW YOUR INITIAL/BOW COLOUR ETC ON CHECK OUT***

name: ✝ "Wilhemina", clip frame purse
description:
“It is wonderful what tricks our dreams play us, and how conveniently we can imagine.” Bram Stoker

A large clip-frame purse wonderfully capable and elegant. Can be used as a makeup purse for your daily essentials or as a clutch purse for sauntering through the shops or to accompany you on evening soirées.

I made this using a good old fashioned wool blend suiting and added a  feature of fine cotton lace than skirts the purse. I then lined it with a dusky pink polkadot cotton poplin as a playful contrast. 

This purse begs to be customised and I have allowed for a range of options that may take your fancy.

>>Bows: add a satin bow to the front, choose pink, sage green or black. 

>>Cameo: add a resin cameo below the bow. The cameo is set into an ivory coloured enamelled setting and will be  fixed onto a brooch making it removable. 

>>Monogram: personalise it with a gauze lace monogram that will sit below the satin bow.

✝The Size: 
Each purse measures about 18cm long and 10cm down.

***DONT FORGET TO LET ME KNOW YOUR INITIAL/BOW COLOUR ETC ON CHECK OUT***

name: ✝ "The Gentle Hunter", cushion cover
description:
I learned to sew through making cushion covers. I really wanted to revisit making them to touch upon my sewing roots and to create unusual, memorable and interesting covers.

The Gentle Hunter is a quiet protest against hunting. The Gentle Hunter shoots with a camera instead of a gun, or captures with a paintbrush instead of iron bars.

This is a limited edition handmade cushion cover made using a 55% cotton and 14% linen print fabric. Designed by the renowned textile designer Furuya Etsuko who's adventurous fabrics is commonly used in fashion, interiors and craft.  Use it to bring comfort, style and colour to your sofa or bed. Each cushion cover is backed with a plain black 55% cotton and 45% linen in a deep envelope style opening.

Each cushion cover measures 39cm x 39cm and will take a 40cm cushion insert for a comfy plump look and feel.

Note that the cushion insert is not included to keep postage low. Fushigi Shop recommends buying a feather or polyester 40cm insert from John Lewis. However, if you would like me to include the insert, I can do so at an extra cost. Please enquire on check out or via my contact form.

>> Remember >> 
The pattern of the cover purchased may vary slightly due to the cut of the fabric.

name: ✝ "Mr Strange on Cold Porcelain", necklace
description:
“For truth is always strange; stranger than fiction.”  George Gordon Byron

✝The Composition: 
Our very own Mr Strange. 
A miniature portrait using vintage altered art that I transferred onto a decal, then carefully applied and fixed it onto a porcelain base formed from cold porcelain. I have used a waterproof varnish to protect it from the elements. The little cameo is then fixed into a pendant loop to make it into a necklace and then gently "aged" for a year to give it a warm vintage feel.

Silver plated chain and pendant loop. Porcelain and vintage decal cameo. If you would prefer a sterling silver chain, this is also available.

✝The Size: 
Each cameo is 25mm x 18mm 
The chain measures about 24 inches and has a further 2 inch extension chain with a little pearl terminal. This can be shortened or lengthened upon request.

name: ✝ "Hello Kitty in the Wild Garden", macaron mirror
description:
✝The Story: 
Hand-stitched, carefully, painstakingly and lovingly by me. Made with a Japan exclusive limited edition Liberty of London and Hello Kitty fabric decorated with cotton lace and a satin bow on the outer shell. The inside of the macaron features a mirror set within a floral lining on one side and a lemon and floral pocket on the other side.

Use it to stash away a secret note, magical ticket or a bit of money. 
This little zip pouch measures about 8.5cm across and will arrive with a ball chain so you can attach it to your bag etc.

I have only made one of these.

name: ✝ "Raven on Cold Porcelain", necklace
description:
But the raven, sitting lonely on the placid bust, spoke only,
That one word, as if his soul in that one word he did outpour.
Nothing further then he uttered - not a feather then he fluttered -
Till I scarcely more than muttered `Other friends have flown before -
On the morrow he will leave me, as my hopes have flown before.'
Then the bird said, `Nevermore.'

✝The Composition: 
A curtsey to Edgar Allen Poe.
I used a vintage illustration and turned it into a decal that I carefully applied and fixed onto a porcelain base that I formed from cold porcelain. I have used a waterproof varnish to protect it from the elements. The little cameo is then fixed into a pendant loop to make it into a necklace and then gently "aged" for a year to give it a warm vintage feel.

Silver plated chain and pendant loop. Porcelain and vintage decal cameo. If you would prefer a sterling silver chain, this is also available.

✝The Size: 
Each cameo is 25mm x 18mm
The chain measures about 24 inches and has a further 2 inch extension chain with a little pearl terminal. This can be shortened or lengthened upon request.

These pencil wraps are made using a stunning and rare printed cotton cloth featuring traditional Japanese patterns in deep earthy colours and gold. It is currently my favourite to sit and stare at!

The wraps have been made rigid and tough enough to keep your items cosy and are lined with a durable organic medium weight cross weave cotton. The cases do up with a quality micro-fibre faux suede cord and can be used flat as pictured or rolled up for extra security.

✝The Size:

name: ✝ "We Are Deep In Dreams", tinned candle
description:
The Story: 
A vast veranda illuminated with a hundred twinkling candles. A door purposely left ajar. A forbidden boudoir. Bowls of exotic ripe fruit. Exquisite perfumes and skin glowing with scented oils. Discarded leather boots, silk dress, lace corset in the shadows.

✝The Composition: 
Top notes of plum, pomegranate and rose seduced by patchouli, violet leaves and rare spices falling onto a base of musk, amber, vanilla, leather and guiac wood.

A deep, rich provocative fragrance.

This is a generously scented candle created with a thoughtful blend of fragrance and essential oils. Each one is hand poured and made with a superior quality soy wax and a cotton wick.

✝The Mortality: 
This is a tinned candle containing about 150g of wax. Measures 7.2cm x 4.5cm and has an approx burn time of 24 hours.

✝ A Note About Soy Wax: 
Soy wax is a clean burning wax as it contains 90% less soot than paraffin wax so it is ceiling and wall friendly. Soy wax is easy to clean up with just soap and water. When you come to the end of your candle, remove the wick, give the tin a quick wash and send it back to me for refilling :)

✝ 1st Light:

name: ✝ "The Strand in Winter Evening", necklace
description:
“Like vanishing dew,
a passing apparition
or the sudden flash
of lightning -- already gone --
thus should one regard one's self.” 
― Ikkyu

✝The Composition: 
Timeless, elegant, demure yet eye-catchingly beautiful this necklace is a flow of luminous faceted Indigo Swarovski Crystals upon a fine but resilient and strong rhodium plated reticulated chain. name: ✝ "Pearl Decides", earrings
description:
There is a lady who often visits Stranger London. Many things have happened to her and many things are awaiting her, all she has to do is pick a path and walk it. Pearl decided to take the wildest way......

Indecision will get you nowhere.

✝The Composition: 
A this way or that way pair of earrings. Hematite arrow heads trap a single naturally textured freshwater pearl. 

✝The Size: 
Each earring measures about 4cm down.

name: ✝ "The Little Forest Dwellers", necklace
description:
Autumn is coming like a black moonrise. Little forest dwellers are preparing to sleep before winters wind runs howling through the trees. While the forest dwellers hide everything falls quiet and waits for the icicles to start their crystalline dance across the land.

✝The Composition: 
Wee little ceramic creatures, found and then oh-so-carefully-and-gently turned into pendants. Finished with a matte gold plated ball chain and lobster clasp. 

✝The Size: 
The chain is about 20" with an additional 2" extension chain to allow for adjusting. Longer chain lengths available, please enquire if required (no additional cost)

The Black + White Rabbit: 30mm x 20mm x 30mm
The Little Bird: 45mm x 23mm x 13mm
The Light Brown Rabbit : 23mm x 27mm x 18mm

Also available with a gold vermeil chain for an additional £5.00 if you prefer. Just let me know upon check out and I shall send you a Paypal request.

name: ✝ "A Forget-Me-Not Atmosphere", necklace
description:
"Wet is my whistle
Wandering wayward
Trouser is caught in a thorny bramble
Sun soon be slipping
Down spine of the meadow
Swamp candle flower
A watery fellow
The monarch's my right hand
Left is the sparrow
Twilight blue my bone and marrow
The river's path is old and narrow
First evening star
To comfort the scarecrow" CocoRosie

✝The Composition: 
Dried forget-me-nots and baby's breath gently caught in Crystal clear glass bubbles upon a long silver plated chain. Inspired by victorian botanical illustrations and old books with flowers pressed within their pages. 

✝The Size: 
The bubble measures about 25mm. 
The chain is purposely long, measuring about 24 inches. This can be shortened upon request. Sterling silver chain can also be arranged.

name: ✝ "Go Away Rain Cloud Hide + Seek", hair accessory
description:
Go Away Rainy Cloud!

A garden favoured by gorgeously colourful butterflies that flutter and loiter in the hair of passing ladies. These darling bows are meant to be positioned upon your your ponytails, braids or buns. While they are not guaranteed to bring out the sun, they will encourage happy thoughts and sunny smiles!

Each bow is made by me using hand-picked fabrics chosen for their high quality finish and beautiful prints and combined with the best quality durable hairbands that I could find.

As every bow is made by hand, each one will be unique. I have tried to make them in a way that they will last and last.

So, even after the hair elastic component goes, the bow can be fixed onto a new one and continue to be used.

I made this using a a limited edition Liberty of London and Hello Kitty fabric (now no longer available).

☆*･゜ﾟ･ The lovely GlacialGlow showing off her Go Away Rain Cloud bow! Check out her blog too: http://glacial-glow.blogspot.com/ *･゜ﾟ･*☆

name: ✝ "Forget-me-not Hello Kitty", mini tote
description:
✝The Story: 

There is a peculiar woman that lurks in corners of Stranger London. She is industrious and determined in all she does. Thoroughly eccentric, she is often heard muttering to herself or seen exploding into a wild jig to suite her fancy. These little very useful bags are inspired by her pernickety yet whimsical soul.
“Things that bring us moments of joy and comfort must not be carted about the place in ugly plastic bags!” Exclaims the curious mistress of Stranger London. 

✝The Composition: 

Hand made little boxy structured totes. Each of them made by me using hand picked fabrics to suit any fancy, predilection and penchant.  
Perfect for the carrying of lunch boxes, books, canisters of tea, knitting, spying equipment (Mrs Marple may well have liked one for herself).

This is the very last that will be made.

"Forget-me-not Hello Kitty", is made using a Hello Kitty and Liberty Japan exclusive cotton lawn and slubby soft denim on the exterior. I have lined with a lavender polkadot polycotton and added a vintage blue lace into the mix. The bag has been reinforced so it is structured and strong. The handles are made of cotton webbing that is soft on the hand yet durable and robust. 


✝The Size:
The bag (excluding the handles) measures about 26cm by 19cm. 

>> Hello Kitty  & Liberty have been collaborating in creating gorgeous fabrics and this is taken from their 1st season as is very rare and hard to find now.

✝ A Note About Liberty Tana Lawn:

Liberty Tana Lawn was launched in 1920 and originally used cotton from the shores of Lake Tana in Sudan. Liberty cotton in exceptionally fine, light and strong with a smooth sheen that makes it feel comparable to silk. There is no doubt why this is the most famous fine cotton in the world.

name: ✝ "Old Man of The Sea", tinned candle
description:
The Story: 
Once I met an old man who was sat on an endless empty beach. He told me that his job is to scour the floors of the oceans to seek out lost keys. But, once a year he is allowed to rise from the sea and breath the fresh night air. He smelled of driftwood and ozone, of bracing cologne and salty air. It mingled the herbaceous fragrance of the sea facing trees and citrus.

✝The Composition: 
Top notes of lemons and bergamot marry with juniper, rosemary and a gentle jasmine. The base is a clean medley of cedar wood and vetiver. 

This is a generously scented candle created with a thoughtful blend of fragrance and essential oils. Each one is hand poured and made with a superior quality soy wax and a cotton wick.

✝The Mortality: 
This is a tinned candle, so you can try them out at a reasonable cost. I hope to make and stock glass candles soon.

Measures 7.5cm x 5cm and has an approx burn time of 25 hours.

✝ A Note About Soy Wax: 
Soy wax is a clean burning wax as it contains 90% less soot than paraffin wax so it is ceiling and wall friendly. Soy wax is easy to clean up with just soap and water. When you come to the end of your candle, remove the wick, give the tin a quick wash and send it back to me for refilling :)

✝ 1st Light: 
When you 1st light your candle, allow the soy wax to create an even melt pool that reaches all sides of the containers.

UK DELIVERY ONLY (mean customs laws)

description:
We all have a moment in our personal histories that we never want to revisit. That moment when sudden realisation struck hard. That moment when we hit the broken floor. That precise juncture when we made that unbreakable promise with ourselves to never return to  such a moment.

✝The Composition:

Matte gold plated leaves flourish from broken pieces of time smoothed black marble, faceted aurora borealis rounds play with light , smooth gleaming Swarovski pearls, a glowing red crystal and a section of a vintage enamelled necklace. The necklace does up with a gold plated loop fastening.

A posy or a  nosegay, is a small bouquet of arranged flowers, typically given as a gift or as an ornament that appeals to the nose to ward off unappealing smells.

Stranger London's posies are both pretty and practical and can be put to a variety of uses. Perfect for makeup, lovely as a mini-bag for garden parties, splendid for the secret transportation of magical apparatus. 

✝The Composition: 
This purse is made using an wonderful Liberty London Tana Lawn Fabric called Tatum first produced in 1955.

Glorious Liberty lawn adorns the exterior. The lining is a poly-cotton polkadot cloth. The pouch has been reinforced and is stiff enough to hold its shape. This cute little handled pouch has a zip closure and is finished with a lavish but removable satin bow.

I have included a removable polypropylene bag bottom that provides waterproof extra support for your lotions and potions. 

✝Washing instructions: Handwash/machine wash as delicate and air dry. Remove the ribbon and polypropylene bottom before washing.

✝The Size:

✝ Note: 
Liberty Tana Lawn was launched in 1920 and originally used cotton sourced from the shores of Lake Tana in Sudan. Liberty cotton is exceptionally fine, light and strong with a smooth sheen that makes it's feel comparable to silk. There is no doubt why this is most famous fine cotton in the world.

Drinking vessels upon her sometimes polished, though often cluttered, surfaces send her nutty and cause her to swoop down on the offending object with much muttering and a soft coaster.

These coasters see the meeting of Liberty print and traditional a Japanese fabric pattern on one side. The reverse is a strong organic cotton linen. They are top stitched and made to last! When you 1st light your candle, allow the soy wax to create an even melt pool that reaches all sides of the containers.

UK DELIVERY ONLY (mean customs laws)

name: ✝ "The Peacock's Feathers ", 3 way drawstring bag/pouch
description:
✝The Story: 
Strutting peacocks on an impassible island within a cloud filled lake

✝The Composition: 
Handsewn by me using Liberty print cloth. This is a roomy lined drawstring bag that can serve a multitude of uses. Using the detachable faux glass pearl strap, it can be carried as a bag, or a wristlet. Remove the pearl strap and you can use it as a pouch. Great to hold your cosmetics or to keep anything that you fancy....magical, mysterious or mischievous.

Each bag has a detachable long chain strap to turn this from a cute bag to a pouch in a blink of a faeries eye.

✝Size: 
Eachbag measures about 22cm by 24cm

name: ✝ "The Gentlewoman", clip frame purse
description:
A large clip-frame purse wonderfully capable and elegant. Can be used as a makeup purse for your daily essentials or as a clutch purse for sauntering through the shops or to accompany you on evening soirées.

Japanese cotton linen cloth featuring a plethora of floral cameos on a black background and lined with a deep red polkadot poplin. Both the lining and feature fabric are reinforced so that they have a nice structure.

✝The Size: 
Each purse measures about 18cm long and 10cm down.

name: ✝ "London Graphics", pencil wraps
description:
Doesn't a pencil "wrap" sound far nicer and cosier for your writing implements than a pencil "tin" or "case"? It's more like a hug for your scribblers! Keep your pencils, pens, eyeliners or even crochet needles safe and sound.

These pencil wraps are made using gorgeous graphic print cotton cloth. The wraps have been made rigid and tough enough to keep your items cosy and are lined with a durable organic medium weight cotton. The cases do up with a high quality micro-fibre faux suede cord and can be used flat as pictured or rolled up for extra security.

✝The Size: 
Measures approx. 7cm x 21cm whilst closed.

name: ✝ "Japanese Blues + Mustards", pencil wraps
description:
Doesn't a pencil "wrap" sound far nicer and cosier for your writing implements than a pencil "tin" or "case"? It's more like a hug for your scribblers! Keep your pencils, pens, eyeliners or even crochet needles safe and sound.

These pencil wraps are made using traditional print Japanese cotton cloth. The wraps have been made rigid and tough enough to keep your items cosy and are lined with a durable organic medium weight cotton. The cases do up with a high quality micro-fibre faux suede cord and can be used flat as pictured or rolled up for extra security.

✝The Size: 
Measures approx. 7cm x 21cm whilst closed.

name: ✝ "One Petal = Sakura", necklace
description:
✝The Story: 
"Blossoms are scattered by the wind and the wind cares nothing, but the blossoms of the heart no wind can touch." Yoshida Kenko

✝The Composition: 
A single petal delicately formed out of my own blend of air dry and stone clays, gently painted, varnished and then strung on a sterling silver box chain.

✝The Size: 
Pendant is about 3cm across. The chain is 18inches long but can be extended (at a small cost) if requested. If you would prefer a different finish chain, just let me know, I can use silver or gold plated chain or even gold vermeil.

The clays used are non-toxic and the finished pendant is waterproof.

name: ✝ "Formal Garden LE Liberty + Hello Kitty Japan", travel card holder
description:
Splendid little jacket for the carrying about and protection of credit card sized fings. Handmade by me using the loveliest and uncompromisingly high quality materials.

"Formal Garden", is made made with a limited edition Liberty of London and Hello Kitty fabric. This fabric is not available outside of Japan. Lined with a durable organic cotton also from Japan. The outer fabric has been strengthened with a special interfacing to make it rigid for extra support.

✝The Size: 
Two pockets good to fit your Oyster Card, Pasmo, Suica or other credit card size travel cards and things.

✝ A Note About Liberty Tana Lawn: 
Liberty Tana Lawn was launched in 1920 and originally used cotton from the shores of Lake Tana in Sudan. Liberty cotton in exceptionally fine, light and strong with a smooth sheen that makes it feel comparable to silk. There is no doubt why this is the most famous fine cotton in the world.

>> Hello Kitty  & Liberty have been collaborating in creating gorgeous fabrics and this is taken from their 2013 collection which is their 4th season together.

name: ✝ "The Mori Girl", barrette
description:
✝The Story: 
'Mori' means forest in Japanese, and a Mori Girl likes loose dresses, lace, vintage prints, snooping in granny's attic, sipping tea and seeking out magical moments. Mori girls take pleasure in stopping to appreciate the little things that others overlook amidst the hustle and bustle and ordinariness of daily life.

✝The Composition: 
This hair barrette has been composed with the utmost of care. I have hand stitched and glued and magicked this together so that it not only evokes whimsical thoughts but it is made to last. Layers of Japanese cotton lace, pleated and pretty flourish beneath a display of acrylic roses and a satin bow. A tiny secret ket nestles among the flowers. I have used a very high quality barrette that is gently curved as the base for this work.

✝The Size: 
This measures about 10.5cm by 5cm

name: ✝ "The Peacock's Pride", OOAK large tote
description:
✝The Story: 
Strutting peacocks in a lake of blue.

✝The Composition: 
This is the largest tote that I have made yet and I am so pleased that it has turned out brilliantly. I used Liberty Tana Lawn in a beautiful print named "isis" with a lovely rustic denim blue organic heavyweight cotton. The interior is lined with navy gingham and has been reinforced so it is flexible and strong with firm bottom (tee hee).The handles are made of cotton webbing that is soft on the hand yet durable and robust.

I have left the bag open in case you would prefer a shopper style. However, if you would like it to have a magnetic clasp in the centre  of the opening, I can add this for you no problem. Just let me know on check-out.

✝The Size: 
The tote measures about 42cm long and 31cm down. 

✝ Note:
Liberty Tana Lawn was launched in 1920 and originally used cotton sourced from the shores of Lake Tana in Sudan. Liberty cotton is exceptionally fine, light and strong with a smooth sheen that makes it's feel comparable to silk. There is no doubt why this is most famous fine cotton in the world.


This is a one of a kind item.
Machine/hand washable as delicate. Air dry. Iron on medium.

description:

name: ✝ "Patchwork Paris", pencil wraps
description:
Doesn't a pencil "wrap" sound far nicer and cosier for your writing implements than a pencil "tin" or "case"? It's more like a hug for your scribblers! Keep your pencils, pens, eyeliners or even crochet needles safe and sound.

These pencil wraps are made using a fine printed Japanese cotton linen cloth. The wraps have been made rigid and tough enough to keep your items cosy and are lined with a durable organic medium weight cotton. The cases do up with a micro-fibre faux suede cord and can be used flat as pictured or rolled up for extra security.

✝The Size:

name: ✝ "Polly's Garden", zip purse
description:
Polly prefers flowers to people. She gave up lavish parties in favour of spending time in her Victorian garden. Ivy snakes up her stoney walls, an old labyrinth has residence in the centre of the vast lawn. Clusters of generous blossoms dance across the greenery.


This is a small-medium sized purse that will serve you well in keeping your makeup, pencils, buttons, sweets, treats, bits and bobs together.

✝The Composition: 
Handmade by me using a Japanese cotton linen cloth of fine quality decorated on one side with a divine lace trim and a scattering of lace blossoms that I have delicately sewn into place. I have lined the purse with a sakura cotton and finished it with an ivory coloured zip.The purse bears a dainty little angel wing charm which is detachable.

Measures about 19cm by 10cm

✝Washing: 
Machine wash as a delicate and air dry. Please remove the charm before washing...it really doesn't like swimming!

name: ✝ "Sophie", zip purse
description:
Sophie is a quiet shyling. A pretty lady, pale as alabaster who hides from the world behind her lace parasol. 

This is a large purse that will serve you well in keeping your makeup, pencils, buttons, sweets, treats, bits and bobs together.

✝The Composition: 
Handmade by me using a Japanese cotton linen cloth of fine quality decorated on one side with a divine lace trim that I have delicately sewn into place. I have lined the purse with a sakura cotton and finished it with an ivory coloured zip.The purse bears a dainty little angel wing charm which is detachable. 

Measures about 24cm by 14cm

✝Washing: 
Machine wash as a delicate and air dry. Please remove the charm before washing...it really doesn't like swimming!

name: ✝ "Be Like That Bird v2", necklace
description:
“Be like the bird that, pausing in her flight awhile on boughs too slight, feels them give way beneath her, and yet sings, knowing that she hath wings.” Victor Hugo

✝The Composition: 
Once upon a time upon a shimmering  gold rhodium plated diamond cut chain, there perched  a tiny little  birdie.

✝The Size: 
The chain is often referred to as a "princess length" and it sits on the collar bone. Measures about 15 inches but has an extender that will bring it up to 16.5 inches.

name: ✝ "A Bientot", brush-roll
description:
“But Paris was a very old city and we were young and nothing was simple there, not even poverty, nor sudden money, nor the moonlight, nor right and wrong nor the breathing of someone who lay beside you in the moonlight.” E. Hemmingway

✝The Composition: 
A vintage Paris inspired brush-roll made by me using a lovely cotton cloth. I have lined the brush roll with a fine durable cotton/linen and finished it with a wide satin ribbon. The roll has 7 pockets to house brushes with widths of various sizes. Each brush-roll is padded and there is a flap that comes down over the bristles which will help to protect your brushes better.

✝The Size: 
Measures about 22cm wide and 28cm long when open with the flap down.

name: ✝ "Endless Wilderness", fabric envelope
description:
✝The Story: 
"Lo from our loitering ship 
a new land at last to be seen; 
Toothed rocks down the side of the firth 
on the east guard a weary wide lea, 
And black slope the hill-sides above, 
striped adown with their desolate green: 
And a peak rises up on the west 
from the meeting of cloud and of sea, 
Foursquare from base unto point 
like the building of Gods that have been, 
The last of that waste of the mountains 
all cloud-wreathed and snow-flecked and grey, 
And bright with the dawn that began 
just now at the ending of day.'
William Morris

Long slim, simple, sleek and stylish envelopes that can be used as elegant clutches, cases for your notebooks and pens, or even as a pouch for your makeup. Wonderful to accompany you well on moonlit soirées, ostentatious operas or opulent occasions. Would also do well for a quick trip to the shops!

✝The Composition: 
The Endless Wilderness is made using a limited edition Liberty print cloth that is part of the autumn/winter 2013 collection . It is lined with a rustic cotton linen and has been strengthened so the clutch though elegant has a structured feel. It will keep your phone lipstick, love potions and wishing well tokens and does up with a magnetic closure. 

Each clutch purse measures about 24.5cm x 12.5cm.

✝ A Note About Liberty Tana Lawn: 
Liberty Tana Lawn was launched in 1920 and originally used cotton from the shores of Lake Tana in Sudan. Liberty cotton in exceptionally fine, light and strong with a smooth sheen that makes it feel comparable to silk. There is no doubt why this is the most famous fine cotton in the world.

This cloth is called "Manning" and takes its inspiration from William Morris’ poem; ‘Iceland First Seen’, the Liberty design team travelled to Iceland on an exploration of the senses to create a series of designs relating to the wonders of sight. 

Manning is a digital design created using photographs of Icelandic glaciers and mountains.

name: ✝ "The Deep Blue", tote bag
description:
✝The Story: 
 
There is a peculiar woman that lurks in corners of the Fushigi Shop. She is industrious and determined in all she does. Thoroughly eccentric, she is often heard muttering to herself or seen exploding into a wild jig to suite her fancy. These roomier useful bags are inspired by Madame Fushigi's pernickety yet whimsical soul. 
“Things that bring us moments of joy and comfort must not be carted about the place in ugly plastic bags!” Exclaims Madame Fushigi.

✝The Composition: 
 
Hand made curved top structured tote bag. Each of them made by me using hand picked fabrics to suit any fancy, predilection and penchant. 
Perfect for the carrying of books, magazines, shopping, spying equipment (Mrs Marple may well have liked one for herself).

"The Deep Blue", is made using a cotton/linen cloth of high quality and lined with a rather raucous cotton featuring many coloured fans with gold lines throughout. The bag has been reinforced so it is structured and strong. The handles are made of cotton webbing that is soft on the hand yet durable and robust. 

✝The Size: 
The bag (excluding the handles) measures about 36cm across by 28cm high. The handles are about 42cm.

✝ Cleaning instructions:
Machine washable on a cool delicate wash. Air dry. Medium Iron.

name: ✝ "Zero Top", blouse
description:
"Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication." Leonardo da Vinci

Simplicity is an intention that I seek in clothing. Peaceful, carefully made garments that are less about fashion and more about clean lines, honest design and fine cloth. 

The Zero Top is a straight lined square shaped and airy blouse inspired by Japanese and Swedish design. Made with a fine soft white cotton lawn, featuring a bateau neckline and red stitching at the hem. 

The bateau neckline is reinforced to give a more clean structured line that will be more resilient to sagging naturally caused by machine washing.

Quiet but attentive details and a shape that will allow for free movement. Airy in the summer and layer-able for the winter.

I have been working on this top for a while now, obsessing about each and every stitch and detail......and am now really pleased to be able to offer a couple in my shop.

Size: Will fit a UK size 8 - 10 (or even a small 12). 

:::Washing instructions:
Machine/handwash in a washing bag (or pillow case) gentle cycle. Iron on medium.

** SOLD OUT but please do let me know if you would like me to make more **

name: "Charming Mint", pouch
description:
I made each of these Charming Mint purses using a natural colour cotton-linen blend, I then added mint green polkadot pockets edged with cotton lace to the front. I hand stitched a Paris inspired print cotton lining into the interior and finally, I finished the pouch with a decorative detachable strap and charm to the zip.

Each pouch measures about 19.5cm x 11cm

name: ✝ "Little Architectures of Tokyo pt II", earrings
description:
"Architecture is the learned game, correct and magnificent, of forms assembled in the light.". Le Corbusier

A collection inspired by nights in most exciting cities across the globe. Exhilarating, glowing, vibrant, pulsating...alive!

✝The Construction: 
Little structures of gold plated crystal set squaredelles supported with "Erinite" Swarovski crystal bicones. Smoky, lucid and lustrous black diamond Swarovski polygons finish the earrings.

Option of silver plated or sterling silver earwires

✝The Size: 
Each earring measures about 7cm from the top of the hook to the base of the last crystal.

name: ✝ "Of Desire and Of Restraint, Generous", bracelet
description:
✝The Story: 
“Those who restrain their desires, do so because theirs is weak enough to be restrained.” William Blake

✝The Composition: 
A bountiful bracelet of coloured leather strands accented with shifting silver plated tube beads. Available in 3 distinct colour options, each bracelet has been finished with silver plated ends, lobster clasps and an extension chain to allow for adjusting.

✝The Size: 
Each of these bracelets will fit a 15cm to 18cm wrist comfortably. The leather section including the ends measure about 15.7 cm.

I am able to make custom made bracelets to fit any sized wrist.

name: ✝ "The Sea King's Gift", necklace
description:
Do you know the tale of the Sea King's gift?

It is an old Finnish story that warns against fanciful promise-making. Never make a promise that you do not at least intend to keep:

"King of the waters, far and near,
     I ask not of thy golden store,
I wish not jewels of pearl to wear,
     Nor silver either, ask I for,
But one is odd and even is two,
     So give me a cow, sea-king so bold,
And in return I'll give to you
     A slice of the moon, and the sun's gold." 

Borrowed from the Lilac Fairy Book. A Lang

✝The Composition: 
A promiscuous configuration of things new, old, smooth, rough, from beneath a hammer and from deep within the earth.  A flattened irregular faceted blue agate slab loiters alongside rough cut hammered pyrite, smooth gleaming potato freshwater pearls and faceted citrine cubes. A reclaimed vintage gunmetal chain grounds the landscape. The necklace does up with a gold plated circle toggle.

✝The Size: 
I wanted to make a necklace that can be worn at different angles to give a variety of looks. The necklace is about 17 inches long.

**** This is a one of a kind necklace. It will never again be recreated****
